Articles.Content:
Ps4 Careermode

Yesterday i lauchned a satnetwork and a ship to duna. While the transferburn the manvuevermarker in the navball changed his postion, i was in mapview of duna. Looked what happend and the maneuver was put on the line for next orbit.

vid

That happend again with the ship i send after, i was in mapview again but focused on the ship but zoomed out so i would see the progress.

If u dont go into mapview that doesnt happen

Haven't Seen that issue in the bugtracker or here yet and i dont know how to link in the bugtracker

Edited February 6, 2018 by PrvDancer85
